title: Lily Vanilli's Dark Chocolate and Avocado Cupcakes
ingredients: ['2 (100g) bars Divine dark chocolate', '200g Tate & Lyle Fairtrade caster sugar', '4 large free range eggs, at room temperature', '100ml soured cream', '200g self-raising flour', '300g very ripe avocado flesh (use the ripest you can find before the flesh has turned brown - cut out any brown bits)', '180g Tate & Lyle Fairtrade Icing Sugar', '1Â½ tsp lemon juice']
